original: Naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka sabbattha vitthāro

original: Naappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na appaccayassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nasappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā dve pe upanissaye dve pe avigate eka sabbattha vitthāro
